set(GLAD_INCLUDE_DIR)
set(GLAD_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS GLAD_GL_IMPLEMENTATION)

if(NOX_PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
    set(GLAD_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/windows/include)
    set(GLAD_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS ${GLAD_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS} GLAD_WGL_IMPLEMENTATION)
endif()

add_library(glad INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(
    glad 
    INTERFACE
    "$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${GLAD_INCLUDE_DIR}>"
    "$<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}>"
)

target_compile_definitions(glad INTERFACE ${GLAD_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS})
